title: S1 Ep63: Controlling Indonesia's forest fires
itunes:title: Controlling Indonesia's forest fires
description: Satellite data from Indonesia shows the damage that out-of-control illegal forest fires, set by farmers to clear their land, do to other people's property and to the environment. Ben Olken tells Tim Phillips how we could reduce this damage by up to 80%.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
